attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty to a person that takes the life of another person.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People are continuing to kill because this country is too lenient with their punishments.  If there is no doubt as to the identity of the person that has killed a person then the person who killed should lose their right to live. If this law was bought into force then it would make people think twice before they take somebodys life.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
